Responsible Gaming

Play & Wager on Solana

Enjoy classic and modern games with blockchain-based wagering on the Solana network. Fast, secure, and low fees.

Featured Games

✊

Rock Paper Scissors

The classic game of chance with a blockchain twist. Wager SOL and play against friends.

💣

Multiplayer Minesweeper

Take turns revealing tiles in this strategic multiplayer game. Avoid the mines or your opponent wins.

🃏

Blackjack

The popular card game where strategy matters. Play against an opponent and win SOL.

🔒

Secure & Transparent

All games run on Solana's blockchain, ensuring transparency and security for every transaction and game result.

Learn More
⚡

Fast & Low Fees

Solana's high-performance blockchain allows for near-instant transactions with fees that are a fraction of a cent.

Learn More
🏆

Fair Gameplay

Provably fair algorithms ensure that all game outcomes are random and cannot be manipulated by anyone.
